panels.title: AptosDB API Success Rate by api_name

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, kubernetes_pod_name) (irate(aptos_storage_api_latency_seconds_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", result="Ok", api_name=~"$api_name"}[1m])) / sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, kubernetes_pod_name) (irate(aptos_storage_api_latency_seconds_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", api_name=~"$api_name"}[1m]))

sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, kubernetes_pod_name) (irate(aptos_storage_api_latency_seconds_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", result="Ok", api_name="$api_name"}[1m])) / sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, kubernetes_pod_name) (irate(aptos_storage_api_latency_seconds_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", api_name="$api_name"}[1m]))

panels.title: AptosDB API Call per Second by api_name

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, kubernetes_pod_name) (irate(aptos_storage_api_latency_seconds_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", api_name=~"$api_name"}[1m]))

panels.title: AptosDB API Error per Second by api_name

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, kubernetes_pod_name) (irate(aptos_storage_api_latency_seconds_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", api_name=~"$api_name", result="Err"}[1m]))

panels.title: SchemaDB get() per Second by cf_name

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, kubernetes_pod_name) (irate(aptos_schemadb_get_latency_seconds_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", cf_name=~"$cf_name"}[1m]))

panels.title: SchemaDB get() Bytes per Second by cf_name

targets.expr: sum by(kubernetes_pod_name, kubernetes_pod_name) (irate(aptos_schemadb_get_bytes_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", cf_name=~"$cf_name"}[1m]))

sum by(kubernetes_pod_name, kubernetes_pod_name) (irate(aptos_schemadb_get_bytes_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", cf_name="$cf_name"}[1m]))

panels.title: SchemaDB iterator next() Latency by cf_name
SchemaDB iterator next() per Second by cf_name

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, kubernetes_pod_name) (irate(aptos_schemadb_iter_latency_seconds_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", cf_name=~"$cf_name"}[1m]))

panels.title: SchemaDB iterator next() Bytes per Second by cf_name

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, kubernetes_pod_name) (irate(aptos_schemadb_iter_bytes_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", cf_name=~"$cf_name"}[1m]))

sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, kubernetes_pod_name) (aptos_rocksdb_properties{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", property_name="aptos_rocksdb_total-sst-files-size", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", cf_name=~"$cf_name"})

panels.title: Number of Accounts vs Internal Nodes

targets.expr: aptos_storage_ledger{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", type="new_state_leaves"} - ignoring(type) aptos_storage_ledger{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", type="stale_state_leaves"}

aptos_storage_ledger{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", type="new_state_nodes"} - ignoring(type) aptos_storage_ledger{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", type="stale_state_nodes"} - ignoring(type) aptos_storage_ledger{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", type="new_state_leaves"} + ignoring(type) aptos_storage_ledger{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", type="stale_state_leaves"}

panels.title: Next Block Epoch
panels.description: On the version that wraps up an epoch, the "next block epoch" is the current epoch plus one.

panels.title: Jellyfish Tree Disk Size vs Calculated Size

targets.expr: rate(aptos_schemadb_put_bytes_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", cf_name="jellyfish_merkle_node"}[10m]) / rate(aptos_schemadb_put_bytes_count[10m]) * ignoring(cf_name) ((aptos_storage_ledger{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", type="new_state_nodes"} - ignoring(type) aptos_storage_ledger{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", type="stale_state_nodes"}) + 1000000 * (log2(aptos_storage_ledger{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", type="new_state_leaves"} - ignoring(type) aptos_storage_ledger{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", type="stale_state_leaves"}) / 2 - 1))

panels.title: Record size (key + value) by Column Family
Avg Internal Node Updates per Account Update

targets.expr: irate(aptos_storage_ledger{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", type="new_state_nodes"}[1m]) / ignoring(type) irate(aptos_storage_ledger{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", type="new_state_leaves"}[1m]) - 1
